column1: '''''Amon Hen'' 173''' is the one-hundred-and-seventy-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)
The journal includes a large excerpt from a formerly unpublished [[Letter to Christopher Fettes
column2: letter by J.R.R. Tolkien to Christopher Fettes]].
